fml.menu.mods.info.description.oneclicko: Adds a little delay after insta-breaking the first block, so you won''t accidentally break the next block with an instant mining tool.
oneclickoneblock.configuration.title: One Click One Block
oneclickoneblock.configuration.delay_tic: Amount of delay after insta-breaking the first block in ticks.
Amount of delay after insta-breaking the first block in ticks.
oneclickoneblock.configuration.first_tim: Displaying help message when triggering the mod.
Displaying help message when triggering the mod.
oneclickoneblock.configuration.notify_on: Showing a message on hotbar when disabling delay (e.g. by pressing the disabling key).
Showing a message on hotbar when disabling delay (e.g. by pressing the disabling key).
oneclickoneblock.message.first_time_trig: One Click One Block: This mod adds a little delay after insta-braking the first block. Delay and other aspects are configurable. (This message only shows up once)
oneclickoneblock.message.delay_disabled: One Click One Block: Delay Disabled
oneclickoneblock.message.delay_enabled: One Click One Block: Delay Enabled
